Class.ClassComment: EntrySizeCalculator /** * @param < K > The key type for this entry size calculator * @param < V > The value type for this entry size calculator */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Method used to calculate how much memory in size the key and value use. * @param key The key for this entry to be used in size calculation * @param value The value for this entry to be used in size calculation * @return The size approximately in memory the key and value use */
